rules_text: When Truthseeker Prodigy enters, amass Soldiers 2. Then target player mills X cards, where X is the amassed Army’s power. [i](To amass Soldiers 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control an Army, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
